linearSolver
Class Lpsolve

java.lang.Object
  linearSolver.Lpsolve

public class Lpsolve
extends java.lang.Object

This class deals with the calls to the lpsolve library and is used to solve linear problem. It is essential to use a linear solver in order to solve DEA problems.

Author:
Hubert Virtos

Method Detail

solveLPProblem

public static SolverResults solveLPProblem(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> Constraints,
                                           double[] ObjF,
                                           double[] RHS,
                                           SolverObjDirection Dir)
The solveLPProblem method solve a Linear Problem. This method is called for each DMU when solving a DEA problem.

Parameters:
Constraints - A double[] of the constraint values.
ObjF - A double[] of the Objective Function values.
RHS - A double[] of the Right Hand Side values
Dir - A SolverObjDirection (MIN or MAX)
Returns:
A SolverResult Object with the solution to the linear problem.
